name: latest_contracts_for_symbol
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool futures.
Tool description: Get daily and historical futures prices for 26 major financial assets and their monthly futures contracts. Lithium, WTI Oil, Brent Crude, Wheat, etc.
API description: This endpoint returns each of the latest futures contracts for a given symbol for the next twelve months.

Use the optional *<month>* parameter to return the latest contract for a given month.

symbol.description: The symbol for which to retrieve futures contracts.

month.description: The month for which to return the latest contract (default is 7).
